name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa, open Haiku Reader”
”Tell Haiku Reader to read me a haiku”
”Ask Haiku Reader to read me a poem”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des:
Haiku Reader is a quirky little skill which enables your Alexa device to read you some poetry inspired by current word afairs. Everybody love haikus - these 3-line short poems which traditionally have a deep meaning (in our case, there is no deep meaning at all).
In the world where you think twice before touching something, Haiku reader offers you a safe virus-free experience.

How it works:
- Just ask Haiku Reader to read you some haiku or poem ("Ask Haiku reader to get me a haiku" or something similar)
- Enjoy
- Repeat!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
